data.text: Hiob toaa nʼasɛm so se,
“Sɛ Onyankopɔn te ase yi, nea wammu me atɛntrenee no,
mmere dodow a nkwa wɔ me mu,
mʼano renka amumɔyɛsɛm,
Merennye nto mu da sɛ nea woka no yɛ nokware;
Mekura me trenee mu, merennyaa mu;
“Ma mʼatamfo nyɛ sɛ amumɔyɛfo,
Anidaso bɛn na wɔn a wonni nyamesu no wɔ wɔ wɔn wu akyi,
So Onyankopɔn tie wɔn sufrɛ
So wɔn ani begye wɔ Otumfo no mu?
“Mɛma mo Onyankopɔn tumi ho nkyerɛkyerɛ;
Mo ankasa moahu eyinom nyinaa.
“Eyi ne nea Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ ama omumɔyɛfo,
Sɛ ɔwɔ mma dodow dɛn ara, wɔn nkrabea ne afoa;
Ɔyaredɔm besie wɔn a wɔbɛka wɔ nʼakyi,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ ɔhɔre dwetɛ te sɛ mfutuma
nea ɔpɛ gu hɔ no, atreneefo na wobefura
Ofi a osi no te sɛ ananse abubummaba,
Ɔda hɔ te sɛ ɔdefo, nanso ɔrenna saa bio;
Ahunahuna ba ne so sɛ nsuyiri;
Apuei mframa soa no kɔ, na onni hɔ bio;
Ɛbɔ no a ahummɔbɔ nni mu
Ɔde fɛw bɔ ne nsam
